'''''"The Flying Outlander"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category [[Wonders of the World]]. To complete the achievement, the player needs to present the [[Restored Score]] to [[Tailleferre]] on [[Petrichor]] after completing the [[World Quest]] ''[[Canticles of Harmony]].''
